column2: Your arrive at Josh's house. You are greeted by Leia and her loud barks. You see lego in every place you look.
You arrive at the York College Campus. Screaming is heard in the distance.

column2: You wake up in a strange place. The sky is cloudy and there is nobody else in sight. You are all alone. Where will you go next?

column3: You stand on the stairs of the Elmwood Mansion.
